hits.name: Samsung - Galaxy S7 32GB - Black Onyx (Verizon)
hits.description: Combine incredible water resistance with a great screen and a powerful processor, and you get the Samsung Galaxy S7. It's built to withstand dunks in water for up to 30 minutes, and then you can wipe it off and get playing with a 5.1-inch touchscreen. The Samsung Galaxy S7 enjoys a quad-core processor for ultra-fast responsiveness.

hits.name: Samsung - Galaxy J3 (2016) 4G LTE with 16GB Memory Cell Phone (Unlocked) - White
hits.description: Work, rest and play with this Samsung Galaxy J3 smartphone. A 5-inch touchscreen delivers easy responses whether you are browsing online or typing a text, and the AMOLED technology delivers great visuals even when it's bright. A powerful quad-core processor lets you play games, study or use apps on this Samsung Galaxy J3 smartphone.

hits.name: Simple Mobile - Samsung GALAXY On5 4G LTE with 8GB Memory Prepaid Cell Phone - Black
hits.description: Stay in touch on the run with this Simple Mobile Samsung Galaxy On5 smartphone. Front- and rear-facing cameras let you connect with friends or share a selfie, and the Android 6.0 Marshmallow operating system keeps your apps running smoothly. A micro SD card slot lets you add up to 128GB of storage on this Simple Mobile Samsung Galaxy On5 smartphone.

hits.name: Samsung - Galaxy S7 edge 32GB - Blue Coral (Verizon)
hits.description: Stay on top of your social media with this Samsung Galaxy S7 edge, which features a bold coral-blue back for fashionable function. The curved 5.1-inch edge-to-edge screen offers ample viewing of contacts or texts. This Samsung Galaxy S7 edge is both water- and dust-resistant for reliable use wherever you go.

hits.name: Samsung - Galaxy S7 32GB - Black Onyx (AT&T)
hits.description: Enjoy the exceptional display and all-day power of the Samsung Galaxy S7 smartphone. A 12MP rear-facing camera and 5MP front-facing camera capture memories as they happen, and the 5.1-inch display uses dual-pixel technology to display them with superior clarity. The Samsung Galaxy S7 smartphone features durable housing and a water-resistant design.

hits.name: Samsung - Galaxy S7 edge 4G LTE with 32GB Memory Cell Phone (Unlocked) - Titanium Silver
hits.description: Use this unlocked Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge phone to stay in touch with friends and family. Its defense-grade KNOX platform provides enhanced security, and it's IP6s water-resistant for protection against spills. A 12-megapixel camera captures quality pictures, and the 3600 mAh battery provides fast charging. Store plenty of information with the expandable 200GB memory of this Samsung Galaxy phone.
